TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AuthenticationSchemeSelector extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function AuthenticationSchemeSelector(httpRequest As HttpListenerRequest) As AuthenticationSchemes

param.name: httpRequest
param.span: 要選取驗證配置的 執行個體。

span.span: The instance for which to select an authentication scheme.

summary.span: 選取 執行個體的驗證配置。

span.span: Selects the authentication scheme for an instance.

returns.span: 其中一個 值，指出要用於指定用戶端要求的驗證方法。

span.span: One of the values that indicates the method of authentication to use for the specified client request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類型的委派由選取一種驗證配置的執行個體根據要求的特性。Delegates of this type are used by instances to select an authentication scheme based on the characteristics of a request. 會傳遞給委派尚未提供驗證資訊的每個連入要求的物件。An delegate is passed an object for each incoming request that has not provided authentication information. 委派叫用此方法會使用物件與任何其他可用的資訊來決定需要哪種驗證配置。The method invoked by the delegate uses the object and any other available information to decide which authentication scheme to require. 使用指定的委派屬性。The delegate is specified by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例會使用此類型的執行個體設定屬性。The following example uses an instance of this type to set the property. [!code-csharp[NCLListener#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[NCLListener#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#2)] 下列範例顯示叫用之方法的實作委派在上述範例中。The following example shows the implementation of the method invoked by the delegate in the previous example. [!code-csharp[NCLListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#1)]
